title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When changing text in the StyledText widget with word wrap enabled, there are multiple unnecessary redraws occurring. This leads to inefficient performance.
EB: This issue should be resolved so that there is only one redraw required for each visible line when changing text with word wrap enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, please follow these steps:
1. Enable word wrap in the StyledText widget.
2. Change the text content in the widget.
3. Observe the multiple unnecessary redraws occurring during the text change.
